TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Litu, title = Litu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Litu} }

S.FORM: alang Litu ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Umitan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 80 buwan, 335 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 95% kyan ku 318 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 5% kyan ku 17 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 82%, Amis 2%, Paywan 2%, Tayan 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 8%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Litu hya' ga Bulbul. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Litu ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Lito ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Umitan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 80 bowan, 335 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 95% kyan ko 318 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 5% kyan ko 17 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 82%, Amis 2%, Paywan 2%, Tayan 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 8%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Lito hya' ga Bolbol. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Lito ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
